alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; San Joaquin River Canyon; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley; Yosemite Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 04 at 1:22AM PST until January 07 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of up to 10 inches are possible above 4,000 feet. Snow accumulations from 12 to 18 inches are possible at elevations above 6,000 feet. Localized snow amounts of 18 inches or more are possible at elevations above 8,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Nevada above 4,000 feet from Yosemite National Park to the South End of the Sierra near Lake Isabella. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday morning through 10 AM Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Expect travel delays. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and wind may adversely impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
